Class Magnitude

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.photometry.Magnitude
public class Magnitude extends Object
Stellar magnitude calculations and conversions. Apparent magnitude (m): Brightness as seen from Earth. Absolute magnitude (M): Brightness at 10 parsecs distance. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • toAbsolute

      public static double toAbsolute(double apparentMag, double distancePc)
      Converts apparent magnitude and distance to absolute magnitude. M = m - 5 * log10(d) + 5
      Parameters:
      apparentMag - Apparent magnitude
      distancePc - Distance in parsecs
      Returns:
      Absolute magnitude

    • toApparent

      public static double toApparent(double absoluteMag, double distancePc)
      Converts absolute magnitude and distance to apparent magnitude. m = M + 5 * log10(d) - 5
      Parameters:
      absoluteMag - Absolute magnitude
      distancePc - Distance in parsecs
      Returns:
      Apparent magnitude

    • distanceModulus

      public static double distanceModulus(double apparentMag, double absoluteMag)
      Calculates distance modulus. μ = m - M = 5 * log10(d) - 5
      Parameters:
      apparentMag - Apparent magnitude
      absoluteMag - Absolute magnitude
      Returns:
      Distance modulus

    • distanceFromModulus

      public static double distanceFromModulus(double distanceModulus)
      Calculates distance from distance modulus. d = 10^((μ + 5) / 5)
      Parameters:
      distanceModulus - μ = m - M
      Returns:
      Distance in parsecs

    • combine

      public static double combine(double... magnitudes)
      Combines magnitudes of multiple sources. m_total = -2.5 * log10(Σ 10^(-m_i/2.5))
      Parameters:
      magnitudes - Array of magnitudes
      Returns:
      Combined magnitude

    • fluxRatio

      public static double fluxRatio(double mag1, double mag2)
      Calculates flux ratio from magnitude difference. F1/F2 = 10^((m2 - m1) / 2.5)

    • deltaMagToFluxRatio

      public static double deltaMagToFluxRatio(double deltaMag)
      Converts magnitude difference to flux ratio.

    • colorToTemperature

      public static double colorToTemperature(double bMinusV)
      Converts B-V color index to effective temperature (approximate). Using Ballesteros formula.
      Parameters:
      bMinusV - B-V color index
      Returns:
      Effective temperature in Kelvin

    • toLuminosity

      public static double toLuminosity(double absoluteMag)
      Converts absolute magnitude to luminosity (solar units). L/L☉ = 10^((M☉ - M) / 2.5)
      Parameters:
      absoluteMag - Absolute visual magnitude
      Returns:
      Luminosity in solar luminosities

    • fromLuminosity

      public static double fromLuminosity(double luminositySolar)
      Converts luminosity to absolute magnitude. M = M☉ - 2.5 * log10(L/L☉)
